title: Approximation of subharmonic functions in the unit disk

title_detail.value: Approximation of subharmonic functions in the unit disk

summary:
Let u be a subharmonic function in D={|z|<1}. There exist an absolute
constant C and an analytic function f in D such that \int_D |u(z)-log|f(z)||
dm(z)<C where m denotes the plane Lebesgue measure. We also consider uniform
approximation.

summary_detail.value:
Let u be a subharmonic function in D={|z|<1}. There exist an absolute
constant C and an analytic function f in D such that \int_D |u(z)-log|f(z)||
dm(z)<C where m denotes the plane Lebesgue measure. We also consider uniform
approximation.
